body.p:
Springfield Ky --
Novr 28th 1862 --
Hon James F Robinson --
Governor of Kentucky --
Dear Sir --
Enclosed find the Petition of Mr Henry H. Alsman for the remission of a fine imposed on a charge of carrying concealed weapons --

I am intimately acquainted with him and have been from his infancy, and have never heard him charged with anything wrong; he is a sober industrious young man; he now resides in Lincoln County and the persons who have signed the petition all reside in the neighborhood where he was raised and resided until a year or two ago --
If you can do anything for him, please enclose the papers to me at this place --
